pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automatic Generation of Interactive Visualizations for Statistical Results // Functionalities to automatically generate interactive visualizations for statistical results supported by 'ggfortify', such as time series, PCA, clustering and survival analysis, with 'plotly.js' https://plotly.com/ and 'ggplot2' style. The generated visualizations can also be easily extended using 'ggplot2' and 'plotly' syntax while staying interactive.
